Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View.GUI

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View.GUI.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
implements View
This class is used to change what the user will see and updates the current scene It is only used for the graphic part, which means display and change of scene layout

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void askAction()
    method that indicates to the DuringGameController with the new moment set that it has to wait for action + slot
    void askFirstConnection()
    This method loads the scene where username and color are asked and add the networkHandler as a listener.
    void askNumberOfPlayers()
    This method loads the scene where the number of players is asked and add the networkHandler as a listener.
    void askWhereToPositionWorkers()
    method that sets method at the moment (current scene) in which the gui expects two positions for the initial workers, in order to allow the main controller to handle the click differently
    void askWhichWorkerToUse()
    method that sets a the moment in which the gui expects the worker to use, in order to allow the main controller to handle the click differently
    void challengerWillChooseThreeGods​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> usernames)
    This method loads the scene where the Challenger is asked to choose the gods and the first player of the game.
    void chooseYourGod​(java.util.ArrayList<GodName> godsChosen)
    This method loads the scene where the player has to choose the god's power that will use during the game.
    GameView getGameView()  
    void othersTurn​(java.lang.String usernameOnTurn)
    method that if the game hasn't started informs the user with an alert to wait, otherwise it sets the wait moment in main scene
    private <T> T setLayout​(javafx.scene.Scene scene, java.lang.String path)
    This method is used to change the layout of the current scene, loading another FXML file.
    void setNetworkHandler​(NetworkHandler networkHandler)  
    void showEnd()
    This method show the final byebye of the game
    void showErrorMessage​(java.lang.String text)
    This method loads an Alert pane with an error message.
    void showGame()
    method used to set the main scene, when the scene with the board is set, the default moment is wait the public information are displayed
    void showImportantMessage​(java.lang.String text)
    This method loads an Alert pane with an information about the game.
    void showNewBoard​(Slot slot)
    method implemented in order to display the same board but with the different slot that has just been updated from the model
    void showPublicInformation()
    gives the informations to the duringGameController to set them in the lateral part of the scene
    void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
    This method makes the GUI starts running.
    void theLoserIs​(java.lang.String usernameLoser)
    This method loads the scene where a loser is declared.
    void theWinnerIs​(java.lang.String usernameWinner)
    This method loads the scene where the winner is declared and the game ends.
    void whileOnGame​(java.lang.String changes)
    This method is used to let the user have more details about what the other player is doing while playing
